pageTitle: Patent US7567067 - Power supply, display device, and light source driving apparatus - Google Patents
textBeforeTable: Patent Citations Although preferred embodiments of the present invention have been described in detail hereinabove, it should be clearly understood that many variations and/or modifications of the basic inventive concepts herein taught which may appear to those skilled in the present art will still fall within the spirit and scope of the present invention, as defined in the appended claims. According to the present invention, the DC-DC converter has a stable output voltage regardless of the variation of the input voltage thereof and noises including harmonic wave components, and reliability of the DC-DC converter is improved. By adjusting the reference duty signal Dref based on the variation of the input signal Vin and sensing the variation of the inductor current in real-time so as to change the duty ratio of the switching control signal q1, the DC-DC converter 940 has a stable output voltage Vout regardless of the variation of the input voltage Vin and noises including harmonic wave components. That is, by adjusting the voltage level of the reference signal Dref based on the variation of the input voltage Vin, the duty ratios of the switching control signals q1 and q2 are varied. A switching period of the switching element Q1 of the DC-DC converter is changed based on the duty ratio of the signal q1, to control the output voltage Vout outputted from the DC-DC converter 940 and applied to the lamp
